item.description:
Learn about the Enneagram 9 types and new information in Herb's new book, Enneagram Beyond the Basics.

Option to buy fabulous macrobiotic dinner with dessert too for an additional $20 beyond $20 workshop fee at 7pm but need at least 1 day's advance notice.

Herb Pearce, Enneagram personality types expert acts out the types and shares his knowledge with interaction. He is the author of 3 books and a therapist who uses the Enneagram in his work with individuals, couples and families and organizations.

www.herbpearce.com, 617 794 7213 cell, herb@herbpearce.com

You can only register by a phone call. Anyone who signs up and doesn't show up or cancel in advance is automatically banned from membership!

Cost $20.

Â
item.how_to_find_us: 1 mile past Newton Marriott on Rt 30, left on Robin Hood Lane immediately after bridge and right on Crescent, go past 4 houses and make right past driveway into 99 Crescent.
item.name: Enneagram Basic and Beyond the Basics
